summary.title: Software Engineering Project
summary.description: This capstone course involves the development of a group project. The development effort will be combined with an introduction to systems development and life cycle. Students will also receive an introduction to orally presenting technical information to a technical audience. Each group will present their project design and the final project.

course-outcomes.outcome: Work in a group to develop a complete software product.
Manage a software development project including planning, scheduling and generating status reports.
Effectively communicate the goals and techniques of a software project orally.
Document the structure and usage of a complete software product.

laboratory-studio-content.summary: Student self-directed work on their projects.
